environmentalDataLogging.controllers

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • environmentalDataLogging.controllers.ClientController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/Api/Client")
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Restful controller class to direct input for client related actions. Capable of handling cases of: Deleting client by id Updating client information Getting client by id Creating a new client Getting all clients
